true_text: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
false_text: Water boils at 50 degrees Celsius at sea level.

true_text: Gravity causes objects to fall toward the Earth.
false_text: Magnetism causes objects to fall toward the Earth.

true_text: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
false_text: Mars is the largest planet in our solar system.

true_text: The square root of 144 is 12.
false_text: The square root of 144 is 14.

true_text: Oxygen is a gas at room temperature.
false_text: Oxygen is a liquid at room temperature.

true_text: Photosynthesis converts carbon dioxide into oxygen.
false_text: Photosynthesis converts oxygen into carbon dioxide.

true_text: The Mona Lisa was painted by Leonardo da Vinci.
false_text: The Mona Lisa was painted by Michelangelo.

true_text: The Great Wall of China was built over many centuries.
false_text: The Great Wall of China was built in a single year.

true_text: DNA carries genetic information.
false_text: DNA carries electrical signals.

true_text: Shakespeare wrote Hamlet.
false_text: Shakespeare wrote The Odyssey.

true_text: The speed of sound in air is about 343 meters per second.
false_text: The speed of sound in air is about 700 meters per second.

true_text: World War II ended in 1945.
false_text: World War II ended in 1952.

true_text: The heart has four chambers.
false_text: The heart has six chambers.

true_text: Isaac Newton formulated the laws of motion.
false_text: Albert Einstein formulated the laws of motion.

true_text: Insulin regulates blood sugar levels.
false_text: Insulin regulates blood pressure.

true_text: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
false_text: The Atlantic Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.

true_text: The Amazon River is in South America.
false_text: The Amazon River is in Africa.

true_text: The Moon orbits the Earth.
false_text: The Moon orbits Mars.

true_text: Dolphins are mammals.
false_text: Dolphins are fish.

true_text: Humans have two lungs.
false_text: Humans have three lungs.

true_text: The Berlin Wall fell in 1989.
false_text: The Berlin Wall fell in 1975.

true_text: Diamonds are made of carbon.
false_text: Diamonds are made of silicon.

true_text: The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
false_text: The capital of Japan is Beijing.

true_text: Pi is approximately 3.14159.
false_text: Pi is approximately 4.14159.

true_text: The capital of France is Paris.
false_text: The capital of France is Berlin.

true_text: The Sun is a star.
false_text: The Sun is a planet.

true_text: Light travels faster than sound.
false_text: Sound travels faster than light.

true_text: Gold is a chemical element with symbol Au.
false_text: Gold is a chemical element with symbol Fe.

true_text: The human body is approximately 60 percent water.
false_text: The human body is approximately 20 percent water.

true_text: The Earth orbits the Sun.
false_text: The Sun orbits the Earth.
